bug.author: loomlike
bug.summary: In Azure reference arch doc, our github link is broken
bug.description: I guess it happened after our file name changes.

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/reference-architectures/ai/real-time-recommendation>https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/architecture/reference-architectures/ai/real-time-recommendation</denchmark-link>
From this doc, see at the top GitHub link and at the bottom ALS example link.
Great catch - sent PR to fix the link.
